EmailTemplate.name: 20182_WebinarInvite_TCAS_LG.20182_WebcastInvite_TCAS_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Technical Webinar: Optimize TCAS Troubleshooting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Tech Tips Webinar: Optimize TCAS Troubleshooting Please join us... Date February 22, 2018
Time 11am-12pm EST (UTC -5)
Location Free Webinar - Register and Attend <[[https://honeywell.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1181327&tp_key=d318927d83]]>
Honeywell pioneered traffic alert collision avoidance system (TCAS) technology for military and commercial aircraft more than a half-century ago and has delivered more systems than anyone else.
Please join Mark Liles, a Honeywell product support expert, to explore maintenance best practices and published technical service information to optimize TCAS troubleshooting and reduce no-fault-founds. Register and attend here <[[https://honeywell.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1181327&tp_key=d318927d83]]>.
Questions will be answered and a recording will be available and communicated after the event.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER AND ATTEND <[[https://honeywell.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1181327&tp_key=d318927d83]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>
